contents: Article 11-2 (Obligations) A committee member, secretary, or person who held that position must comply with the following obligations and submit an oath in the attached Form No. 7. Revised on December 20, 2019. 1. Information or documents acquired in the course of committee activities cannot be arbitrarily published or distributed to others. 2. You must not disclose or steal secrets learned while performing committee duties. [This article was newly established on January 31, 2019]
